Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory249.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yin', 3: "Damn it! I can't believe I lost...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yin', 3: 'Why have you left me alive? Are you trying to embarrass me?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Go. I won't condemn you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yin', 3: "How laughable. I'm your enemy! From the moment we raised our weapons against each other, we are no longer relatives!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You're right. You have brought war and destruction to Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yin', 3: 'But you still...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But you are still someone I must protect.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yin', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Our experiences and ideals may be different, but you are still unique to this world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Your resentment and anger is also one of the countless emotional ties around me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Once you die, these things will be erased. No one will be able to replicate your existence and emotions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Brother, you also can free yourself from family bonds.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "As you said, the country doesn't need two rulers.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'The obsession and pain of becoming Sovereign will only restrain you. Now, you are free to do whatever you so choose. Just like everyone else.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Hmph, that all you got?'}
{2: '???', 3: "You're meant to become Sovereign. How can you stop at a time like this?"}
{2: '???', 3: "Why are you wasting your time? They won't help you become Sovereign!"}
{2: 'Yin', 3: 'Qu, Villy, look what I brought for you.'}
{2: 'Yin', 3: 'This is Jiaogong and Huiyu. These bionic creatures are quite rare.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory249.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "I will carry on with this burden and fulfill the Sovereign's duties to my very last breath.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yin whispers softly. Qu stands overlooking the entirety of Kowloong.'}
